knimeNode.name: R Snippet (2:1)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Executes an R script within KNIME.

fullDescription.intro: This node executes a snippet/script using an R server (Rserve). The node provides the same functionality like the 'R Snippet' node but additionally it allows to push a second table to R. Within R the data frames will be named 'kIn1' and 'kIn2'. For further information: See node description of the 'R Snippet' node.
